import React from 'react' import '../tailwind.output.css' const Regex = RegExp(/^\s?[A-Z0–9]+[A-Z0–9._+-]*@[A-Z0–9._+-]+\.[A-Z0–9]{2,4}\s?$/i) interface SignUpProps { name?: any value?: any } interface SignUpState { userName: string fullName: string eMail: string passWord: string passWord2: string errors: { userName: string fullName: string eMail: string passWord: string passWord2: string } } export class SignUpForm extends React.Component { constructor(props: SignUpProps) { super(props) this.state = { userName: '', fullName: '', eMail: '', passWord: '', passWord2: '', errors: { userName: '', fullName: '', eMail: '', passWord: '', passWord2: '', }, } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } handleChange = (event: any) => { event.preventDefault() const { name, value } = event.target const errors = this.state.errors switch (name) { case 'userName': errors.userName = value.length < 5 ? 'Must be 5 characters long!' : '' break case 'fullName': errors.fullName = value.length < 5 ? 'Must be 5 characters long!' : '' break case 'eMail': errors.eMail = Regex.test(value) ? '' : 'Email is not valid!' break case 'passWord': errors.passWord = value.length < 8 ? 'Must be 8 characters long!' : '' break case 'passWord2': errors.passWord2 = value.length < 8 ? 'Must be 8 characters long!' : '' break default: break } this.setState(Object.assign(this.state, { errors, [name]: value })) console.log(this.state.errors) } handleSubmit = (event: any) => { event.preventDefault() let validity = true const { passWord, passWord2 } Object.values(this.state.errors).forEach((val) => val.length > 0 && (validity = false)) if (pas) if (validity) { console.log('Registering can be done') alert('Registration successful!') } else { console.log('You cannot be registered') alert('Invalid registration! Please go back and double check your information and make sure that is valid.') } } render() { const { errors } = this.state return (
{errors.userName.length > 0 && ( )}
{errors.fullName.length > 0 && ( )}
{errors.eMail.length > 0 && ( )}
{errors.passWord.length > 0 && ( )} {errors.passWord2.length > 0 && ( )}
) } } export default SignUpForm
